quotes.quote: Generosity is often the stalking horse of control.
Are you stalking me, Mr. Fulton? The idea both amused and horrified Jazz.
I was just about to ask you the same thing. I know you followed me. Don't look so surprised. It's called a rear-view mirror. Are you stalking me for a specific reason?
For the first time all day I felt safe. Except that Patch had cornered me in a dark tunnel and was possibly stalking me. Maybe not so safe.
Until you stalk and overrun, you cannot devour anyone.
Is this one of those days where we all stalk out in fury? Because I simply haven't got the energy for it.
All successful employers of labor are stalking men who will do the unusual, men who think, men who attract attention by performing more than is expected of them.
He who searches for evil, must first look at his own reflection.
That boy needs a hobby. Stalking is a hobby. So is serial killing.
It's a fine line between love and stalking.
As fleeting emotions stalk it, a face can leak fear or the guilt of a forming lie.
Sketchy black van? Weird stalking of my house? What are you going to do next, offer me some candy?
All I need is a badly mangled, irate sentence stalking me.
Value, therefore, does not stalk about with a label describing what it is.
You know, if you're going to stalk someone, you should be less obvious. For starters, try not to standing in the middle of a field, gawking at your prey.
It’s not stalking if you don't follow them home, right?
She thinks you're stalking me. Why the hell would I do that? I see too much of your ugly mug as it is.
I think the very word stalking implies that you're not supposed to like it. Otherwise, it would be called fluffy harmless observation time.
Tell me again how you're not stalking me?
I don't think you can call it stalking when it's just phone calls and letters and emails and knocking on the door.
Don't play his game. Play yours.

Maybe instead of stalking her, you should go out with someone else. He sighed. You don't think I've tried? How can anyone compare? You might not believe this, but there is no one like her at this school.
Are you stalking me? Because that would be super.
Intemperance is a hydra with a hundred heads. She never stalks abroad unaccompanied with impurity, anger, and the most infamous profligacy.
Often you don't know whether you're the hero of a romantic comedy or the villain on a Lifetime special until the restraining order arrives.
You cannot make someone love you, all you can do is stalk them and hope they panic and give in.
The best protection against rape, stalking, and domestic violence is to raise men who both understand that women are different, and would never dare take advantage of this difference.
Be leery of silence. It doesn't mean you won the argument. Often, people are just busy reloading their guns.
When someone is stalking you because they think you are stalking them, it makes you wonder who really is the true stalker?
Women never stalk men; they just research them intensely.
